about.title: ABOUT US
content: MDian is a custom software development company founded in 2019. We are a leading technology company with a strong track record of developing innovative applications from scratch.

Our main business covers a wide range of industries and fields, including blockchain, artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things, SaaS, education, and healthcare. We are committed to providing our clients with high-quality, cost-effective software development services to help them achieve their business goals.

We have a team of experienced engineers with a proven track record of delivering projects on time and to high standards. We also offer post-sales support to help our clients resolve any issues they may encounter while using our software.
If you are looking for a leading software development company that can help you achieve your business goals, please contact Mandian Information Technology today.

mpoc.title: MPOC NFT Music Market
items: 支持ERC1155, 兼容OpenSea等主流NFT交易平台
支持多种音频以及视频格式, 支持多种解码规格和音乐保护
现代化的在线播放器, 支持作品收藏, 音乐人收藏等
多种交易模型以及多币种支付, 安全高效
